com.clown.bot

Class TwitchBot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clown.bot.TwitchBot

  • public final class TwitchBot
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Calvin The main class. Despite being the main, it basically just provides an entry point into the program, and other threads take over all the heavy lifting.

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static com.clown.bot.server.ServerConnection getGroupConnection()
      Returns the ServerConnection for the group IRC.
      static com.clown.bot.server.ServerConnection getIRCConnection()
      Returns the ServerConnection for the chat IRC.
      static void issueKill()
      Sets killIssued to true, which will cause all thread loops to terminate after their current cycle.
      static boolean killIssued()
      Allows other objects to see the state of killIssued.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Instantiates the ircConnection and groupConnection objects, and adds a shutdown hook to send a message to all the channels.

    • Method Detail

      • getGroupConnection

        public static com.clown.bot.server.ServerConnection getGroupConnection()
        Returns the ServerConnection for the group IRC.
        Returns:
        the groupConnection object.

      • getIRCConnection

        public static com.clown.bot.server.ServerConnection getIRCConnection()
        Returns the ServerConnection for the chat IRC.
        Returns:
        the ircConnection object.

      • issueKill

        public static void issueKill()
        Sets killIssued to true, which will cause all thread loops to terminate after their current cycle.

      • killIssued

        public static boolean killIssued()
        Allows other objects to see the state of killIssued.
        Returns:
        the value of killIssued.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Instantiates the ircConnection and groupConnection objects, and adds a shutdown hook to send a message to all the channels. Once ircConnection and groupConnection are instantiated, the automatically call their own start method, and take over almost all the work of the program.
        Parameters:
        args - main args.
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if there was an error connecting to the host.
        java.io.IOException - if an IOException was thrown for any reason.
